meanings.sent1: Her disinterests in the topic made the conversation dull.

meanings.definition: To cause someone to lose interest or enthusiasm.
meanings.sent1: The long lecture disinterests the students quickly.
meanings.sent2: Constant interruptions can disinterests even the most engaged listeners.
meanings.sent3: The magician's repetitive tricks disinterests the audience after a while.
meanings.sent4: The monotonous tone of the speaker disinterests the crowd within minutes.
meanings.sent5: The lack of variety in the menu disinterests the diners at the restaurant.
